name: BlingPoint
tagline: BlingPoint is a JS runtime & framework for easily building instrumented, modular and robust SharePoint solutions that relies on the best design principles.
body: # FEATURES BlingPoint provides an easy to use, lightweight and efficient library of tools and features to ease development of powerful, modular & robust SharePoint solutions : - Embedded logging & diagnostic system : https://github.com/guillaumemeyer/BlingPoint/wiki/Logging-&-Diagnostics - Simple profiling tool : https://github.com/guillaumemeyer/BlingPoint/wiki/Profiling - PlugIn Management System : https://github.com/guillaumemeyer/BlingPoint/wiki/PlugIn-Management - Schema provisioning : https://github.com/guillaumemeyer/BlingPoint/wiki/Schema-Namespace - Application parameters Management : https://github.com/guillaumemeyer/BlingPoint/wiki/Application-parameters - Scripts & CSS dynamic loading : https://github.com/guillaumemeyer/BlingPoint/wiki/Loading-resources - Script-oriented syntax : https://github.com/guillaumemeyer/BlingPoint/wiki/Script-oriented-syntax - URL tools : https://github.com/guillaumemeyer/BlingPoint/wiki/URL-tools - More to come... Stay Tuned ! # GET STARTED As a single minified javascript file, BlingPoint is easy to deploy : - Using a bookmarklet to inject it dynamically into any SharePoint page - By registering a script tag in your site MasterPage - Using a Sandbox solution to register a new ScriptLink # MORE ? - Checkout the code at Github And don't hesitate to fork and send a pull request for any cool example of yours as well! - Public API are documented through YuiDoc generation, see dist\version\docs\ folder. - Support ? Join the BlingPoint community - Follow @blingpoint on Twitter - Troubleshooting? Open an issue # ACKNOWLEDGEMENTS - My wonderful wife for supporting me during these weeks of late homework - The worldwide SharePoint community for their help and advised advices - BlingPoint log viewer & profiling tool is a fork of the great BlackBirdJs Open Source JavaScript Logging Utility by G Scott Olson : https://code.google.com/p/blackbirdjs/
